itemDescription: British Army officer and Conservative politician (born 1954)

wikipedia_page.main: Luke Richard White, 6th Baron Annaly (born 1954), is a British hereditary peer and former Government Whip in the House of Lords, who sat on the Conservative benches.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: ******* Luke White, 6th Baron Annaly (born 1954), Lord-in-Waiting and Conservative Cherwell District Councillor 2007–11.www.cherwell.gov.uk Son of Luke.
*Luke White, 6th Baron Annaly (born 1954), British Army officer and Conservative politician
